pt: {sc}certainty{/sc} {sc}certitude{/sc} {sc}conviction{/sc} mean a state of being free from doubt. {sc}certainty{/sc} and {sc}certitude{/sc} are very close; {sc}certainty{/sc} may stress the existence of objective proof

{sc}opinion{/sc} {sc}view{/sc} {sc}belief{/sc} {sc}conviction{/sc} {sc}persuasion{/sc} {sc}sentiment{/sc} mean a judgment one holds as true. {sc}opinion{/sc} implies a conclusion thought out yet open to dispute.
